lead_paragraph: SMITH--Jeri Binder, of New York City, mother and actress, dies at 91 peacefully at home, surrounded by love. She was an extraordinary woman and will be deeply missed! Jeri had a long career in show business, culminating at age 89 with her unforgettable Esurance commercial. Jeri was a devoted mother to her three daughters, Marla, Andrea, and Pamela and to their husbands. She is also survived by five loving grandchildren, her sister and her three nieces. Following a private graveside service, the family will observe Shiva on Sunday, January 31 at Jeri's apartment in New York City from 5-8pm and on Monday, February 1 at the home of Pamela Fisher in Mahwah, NJ from 4-8pm. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SMITH, JERI BINDER
